title: “Inability to understand the language spoken by each other is the main reason for creating distance” says Minister Alahapperuma
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Wasantha Hemal) Dallas Alahapperuma, Minister of Youth Affairs and Skills Development said that inability to understand the language spoken by each other is the main reason for creating distance between different communities in Sri Lanka. It is an obstacle for peace among Sinhalese and Tamils as well….
